text: Silvio Peter "Tino" Insana (February 15, 1948 â€“ May 31, 2017) was an American actor, producer, writer, singer, voice artist, and comedian, best known for his roles in Barnyard, Back at the Barnyard, Bubble Guppies, Bobby's World, and Spaceballs: The Animated Series. On May 31, 2017, Insana died of cancer in Los Angeles, California at the age of 69. ==Early life== Insana was born Silvio Peter Insana in Chicago, Illinois on February 15, 1948. ==Death== On May 31, 2017, Insana died of cancer in Los Angeles, California at the age of 69. ==Filmography== Film Year Title Role Notes 1977 Cracking Up 1981 Neighbors Perry Greavy 1983 Going Berserk Biker Leader 1986 Three Amigos Studio Guard 1987 Amazon Women on the Moon Mr. Sylvio (segment "Video Pirates") 1988 The Couch Trip Jail Guard #1 1988 For Keeps Capt. O'Connell 1989 Who's Harry Crumb? Smokey 1989 Wedding Band Hugh Bowmont 1990 Why Me?
